about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: Make room for cars that are entering the freeway by:

about.name: Make room for cars that are entering the freeway by:

hasPart.assesses: Make room for cars that are entering the freeway by: | Make room for cars that are entering the freeway by: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Make room for vehicles that are entering a freeway. If possible, merge into the next lane to create a gap for the incoming vehicles. If you cannot merge, adjust your speed to allow for the vehicles to enter traffic as smoothly and safely as possible.

answerExplanation.text: Make room for vehicles that are entering a freeway. If possible, merge into the next lane to create a gap for the incoming vehicles. If you cannot merge, adjust your speed to allow for the vehicles to enter traffic as smoothly and safely as possible.

comment.text: Make room for cars that are entering the freeway by: | Make room for vehicles that are entering a freeway. If possible, merge into the next lane to create a gap for the incoming vehicles. If you cannot merge, adjust your speed to allow for the vehicles to enter traffic as smoothly and safely as possible.

hasPart.name: A curb painted red means:
hasPart.assesses: A curb painted red means: | A curb painted red means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: You may not stop, stand, or park at a red-painted curb.

suggestedAnswer.text: The area is reserved for picking up or dropping off passengers.

comment.text: The area is reserved for picking up or dropping off passengers.

answerExplanation.text: You may not stop, stand, or park at a red-painted curb.

comment.text: A curb painted red means: | You may not stop, stand, or park at a red-painted curb.

hasPart.name: The best thing to do if you become tired while driving is to:

about.name: The best thing to do if you become tired while driving is to:

hasPart.assesses: The best thing to do if you become tired while driving is to: | The best thing to do if you become tired while driving is to: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: If you become tired while driving, it is best to stop to rest or change drivers. Being tired dulls your mind and slows down your reactions, making driving hazardous.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stop to rest or change drivers.

comment.text: Stop to rest or change drivers.

acceptedAnswer.text: Stop to rest or change drivers.

comment.text: Stop to rest or change drivers.

answerExplanation.text: If you become tired while driving, it is best to stop to rest or change drivers. Being tired dulls your mind and slows down your reactions, making driving hazardous.

comment.text: The best thing to do if you become tired while driving is to: | If you become tired while driving, it is best to stop to rest or change drivers. Being tired dulls your mind and slows down your reactions, making driving hazardous.

hasPart.name: When is it legal for minors to use a cell phone without a hands-free device while driving?

about.name: When is it legal for minors to use a cell phone without a hands-free device while driving?

hasPart.assesses: When is it legal for minors to use a cell phone without a hands-free device while driving? | When is it legal for minors to use a cell phone without a hands-free device while driving? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: It is illegal for minors to use a cell phone at all while driving, except to contact an emergency entity in an emergency situation. For adult drivers, the use of hands-free devices is permitted; however, to avoid distractions, it is advisable to make calls only if needed to call for help in an emergency.

suggestedAnswer.text: When making a call while stopped at the red light

comment.text: When making a call while stopped at the red light

suggestedAnswer.text: When making a call for emergency assistance

comment.text: When making a call for emergency assistance

acceptedAnswer.text: When making a call for emergency assistance

comment.text: When making a call for emergency assistance

answerExplanation.text: It is illegal for minors to use a cell phone at all while driving, except to contact an emergency entity in an emergency situation. For adult drivers, the use of hands-free devices is permitted; however, to avoid distractions, it is advisable to make calls only if needed to call for help in an emergency.

comment.text: When is it legal for minors to use a cell phone without a hands-free device while driving? | It is illegal for minors to use a cell phone at all while driving, except to contact an emergency entity in an emergency situation. For adult drivers, the use of hands-free devices is permitted; however, to avoid distractions, it is advisable to make calls only if needed to call for help in an emergency.

hasPart.name: Abandoning an animal on the highway may result in:

about.name: Abandoning an animal on the highway may result in:

hasPart.assesses: Abandoning an animal on the highway may result in: | Abandoning an animal on the highway may result in: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: It is illegal to dump or abandon an animal on the highway. Doing so can result in six months of jail time, a fine of up to $1,000, or both.

answerExplanation.text: It is illegal to dump or abandon an animal on the highway. Doing so can result in six months of jail time, a fine of up to $1,000, or both.

comment.text: Abandoning an animal on the highway may result in: | It is illegal to dump or abandon an animal on the highway. Doing so can result in six months of jail time, a fine of up to $1,000, or both.

hasPart.name: If a traffic signal light is green and a police officer signals for you to stop, you should:

about.name: If a traffic signal light is green and a police officer signals for you to stop, you should:

hasPart.assesses: If a traffic signal light is green and a police officer signals for you to stop, you should: | If a traffic signal light is green and a police officer signals for you to stop, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Drivers must obey any instructions given by a police officer, even if the instructions contradict laws, signs, signals, or markings that would otherwise apply.

suggestedAnswer.text: Do what the vehicle in front of you does.

comment.text: Do what the vehicle in front of you does.

answerExplanation.text: Drivers must obey any instructions given by a police officer, even if the instructions contradict laws, signs, signals, or markings that would otherwise apply.

comment.text: If a traffic signal light is green and a police officer signals for you to stop, you should: | Drivers must obey any instructions given by a police officer, even if the instructions contradict laws, signs, signals, or markings that would otherwise apply.
